Here it is again. The first one can be found by reading post 21224.

::Zardus/FZ/Perndabot::

Zardus nods, looking at Delta. "I need you here for now, to help 
build on the defences."

He turns back to Diamond, nodding at her answer. "Allright. The 
target is the Predacon leader. Her name's KitKat, but she will be 
very well guarded. I can get you more info on her from the Alliance 
computer. Will you need any assistance doing this?"

Hearing Dark One's voice in his head, he responds to it by the same 
method as Dark One contacted him. "Hmm.. Excellent. An old relic from 
the old days of the Alliance is on his way to you. He looks exactly 
like me and is linked to my mind, in other words I control him. It 
would be easier to consult him while he's there instead of sending me 
transmissions. He will introduce himself as Zardus, simply play 
along."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
FZ lands behind Dark One, looking at Vehemoth and his troops.

"I am Zardus," he says, stepping forward, "I understand you're the 
new faction that has landed on this planet?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Perndabot pauses, turning around to see if BrightBlade was still 
behind him.






--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> OK Yanshosh, I guess I missed it.  I think I know the answer, but 
> just tell me again anyway. I some how missed that post.
